buildup.text: The hippocampus is a seahorse-shaped structure deep in the brain. It converts short-term experiences into long-term

discovery.text: Without a hippocampus, you live in a permanent present. H.M. introduced himself to his doctor every day for 30 years.

punchline.text: He forgot every person he met. But his hands never forgot how to draw a star.

quiz.question: What is the hippocampus's role in memory?
options: It converts short-term experiences into long-term memories
